meanings.definition: A person who specializes in or is skilled at using computers.
meanings.sent1: The computists at the tech company fixed my laptop.
meanings.sent2: Many computists work in the IT department.
meanings.sent3: The computists had a race to see who could type the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a wizard with computers, a true computists.
meanings.sent5: The computists' knowledge of technology was impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of using computers for various tasks.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the convenience of computists in my daily life.
meanings.sent2: Computists have revolutionized the way we work.
meanings.sent3: The computists danced around the office, typing away on their keyboards.
meanings.sent4: In today's world, we are all computists in one way or another.
meanings.sent5: The computists' efficiency in using computers was unmatched.
